page_content: Discusses the risk of forest fires in parts of the Canton of Bern.
Discusses new regulations for the management of nursing homes and home care services in the Canton of Bern.
Discusses road closures and restrictions in Bern due to a state visit.
Discusses two students at Gymnasium Neufeld testing positive for Covid-19 and the subsequent actions taken.
Discusses insurance premiums for free provision (Säule 3b) aimed at financial security in old age, death, and disability.
Discusses various tax deductions, including those for professional training, insurance premiums, and health costs.
Discusses pensions from tied provision (Säule 3a) and their taxation.
